meanings.definition: To be born again in another body after death.
meanings.sent1: She believes her cat will be reincarnated as a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: Many people think that when they die, they will be reincarnated.
meanings.sent3: The old tree was reincarnated as a beautiful wooden bench.
meanings.sent4: Her love for music was reincarnated in her daughter, who became a talented pianist.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tradition of storytelling was reincarnated in the form of a podcast.

meanings.definition: To bring back into existence or use.
meanings.sent1: The artist reincarnated an old painting by adding new colors.
meanings.sent2: After years of neglect, the historic building was reincarnated as a trendy cafe.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten recipe was reincarnated by a young chef with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: The classic tale was reincarnated in a contemporary setting, captivating a new audience.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned garden was reincarnated into a vibrant community space.
